semantic_identifier: [GOLD-101]: Introduce versioned positioning blocks from Customer_Analyzer in Sales_Accelerator
title: Introduce versioned positioning blocks from Customer_Analyzer in Sales_Accelerator

sections.text: Add support for ingesting and storing Customer_Analyzer positioning blocks with explicit version metadata (version id, published timestamp, author/source). Ensure Sales_Accelerator always references a specific published version when generating recommendations/messaging, rather than an unversioned “latest” payload. Expose the stored version fields in internal logs/telemetry to enable auditability and reduce drift risk.
